xmlquery.searchActuatorByIdSite: Select a.idActuator as idActuator, a.idRelay as idRelay, a.command as command, a.updatedTime as updatedTime, a.updatedBy as updatedBy, a.createdTime as createdTime, a.createdBy as createdBy from smiot_actuator a inner join smiot_device b on a.idActuator = b.idDevice where b.idSite = ?
xmlquery.actuatorDelete: Delete from smiot_actuator where idActuator=? and idRelay=? and idActuator in (select idDevice from smiot_device where idSite=?)
xmlquery.actuatorOnOff: Update smiot_actuator set command = ? where idActuator = ? and idRelay=? and idActuator in (select idDevice from smiot_device where idSite=?)
xmlquery.actuatorEdit: Update smiot_actuator set idActuator=?,idRelay=?, updatedBy=? where idActuator=? and idRelay=? and idActuator in (select idDevice from smiot_device where idSite=?)
xmlquery.actuatorActive: Update smiot_actuator set command=0, updatedBy=? where idActuator=? and idRelay=? and idActuator in (select idDevice from smiot_device where idSite=?)
xmlquery.actuatorInactive: Update smiot_actuator set command=3, updatedBy=? where idActuator=? and idRelay=? and idActuator in (select idDevice from smiot_device where idSite=?)
